Hello World - Vue

Result

Source

Bundle sizes:
23.7 kB Gzip
21.4 kB Brotli
  • App.vue
  • index.js 
<!-- Since Vue replaces the element given in el, we redefine it here so tests work -->
<template>
  <div id="app">
    <div>Hello World!</div>
  </div>
</template>
import Vue from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";

new Vue({
	el: "#app",
	components: { App },
	render(createElement) {
		return createElement(App);
	}
});
